{"id":671812993,"lang":"swift","time":"3 months, 1 week","timestamp":1648842871,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"56 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/671812993/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome II","memory":"15.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    func validPalindrome(_ s: String) -> Bool {\n        let array = Array(s)\n        \n        var leftPointerIndex = 0 \n        var rightPointerIndex = array.count - 1\n        \n        while leftPointerIndex < rightPointerIndex {\n            let leftChar = array[leftPointerIndex]\n            let rightChar = array[rightPointerIndex]\n            \n            // this is the trick\n            if leftChar != rightChar { \n                return isPalindrome(array, leftPointerIndex+1, rightPointerIndex) || \n                    isPalindrome(array, leftPointerIndex, rightPointerIndex-1)\n            }\n            \n            leftPointerIndex += 1\n            rightPointerIndex -= 1\n        }\n        \n        return true\n    }\n    \n    private func isPalindrome(_ array: [Character], _ leftIndex: Int, _ rightIndex: Int) -> Bool {\n        var leftPointerIndex = leftIndex \n        var rightPointerIndex = rightIndex\n        \n        while leftPointerIndex <= rightPointerIndex {\n            let leftChar = array[leftPointerIndex]\n            let rightChar = array[rightPointerIndex]\n            \n            if leftChar != rightChar { return false }\n            \n            leftPointerIndex += 1\n            rightPointerIndex -= 1\n        }\n        \n        return true\n    }\n}\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome-ii"}
